dcterms:creator: P. Zhou
X. Han
V. I. Morariu
L. S. Davis
dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created from COCO by randomly selecting objects from one image with the segmentation mask and splicing to other images. It contains 11K manipulated images with the ground-truth tampered masks.
dcterms:title: COCO synthetic dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Guan
M. Kozak
E. Robertson
Y. Lee
A. N. Yates
A. Delgado
D. Zhou
T. Kheyrkhah
J. Smith
J. Fiscus
dcterms:description: A challenging dataset of Nimble Challenge Evaluation 2016, containing three tampering types with masks provided to indicate where manipulation takes place. The dataset is split into two groups: 404 images for fine-tuning and 160 images for evaluation.
dcterms:title: NIST16

dcterms:creator: J. Dong
W. Wang
T. Tan
dcterms:description: Contains splice and copy-move tampered images, with ground-truth masks obtained by subtracting tampered images from their original images. It includes CASIA 2.0 with 5,123 images for fine-tuning and CASIA 1.0 with 921 images for evaluation.
dcterms:title: CASIA

dcterms:creator: B. Wen
Y. Zhu
R. Subramanian
T.-T. Ng
X. Shen
S. Winkler
dcterms:description: A small copy-move dataset where a tampered image is created by copying a small object from a duplicated region and pasting it onto the same image. Ground-truth masks are provided.
dcterms:title: COVERAGE

dcterms:creator: T.-T. Ng
J. Hsu
S.-F. Chang
dcterms:description: A small dataset containing 180 splicing images with ground-truth marks provided. The dataset is used for evaluating image splicing detection.
dcterms:title: Columbia

dcterms:creator: A. Novozamsky
B. Mahdian
S. Saic
dcterms:description: A large-scale annotated dataset tailored for detecting manipulated images, consisting of 2,010 real-life manipulated images collected from the Internet.
dcterms:title: IMD20
